title: Repeals provisions relating to rates of payment of residential health care facilities and the withdrawal of equity and the transfer of assets
summary: Repeals provisions relating to rates of payment of residential health care facilities and the withdrawal of equity and the transfer of assets of such facilities.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2790

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   February 1, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KLEIN  -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Health

       AN ACT to repeal paragraph (c) of subdivision 5 of section 2808  of  the
         public  health law, relating to rates of payment of residential health
         care facilities and the withdrawal  of  equity  and  the  transfer  of
         assets of such facilities

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph (c) of subdivision  5  of  section  2808  of  the
    2  public health law is REPEALED.
    3    S  2.  This act shall take effect the day after it shall have become a
    4  law.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02952-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph (c) of subdivision 5 of section 2808 of the public health law, relating to rates of payment of residential health care facilities and the withdrawal of equity and the transfer of assets of such facilities
